subject: A more efficient keyboard driver
msgSnippet: Okay, I messed around a bit with Brian Roberts frequency list, available at http://www.wpi.edu/~flicken/language/shavian/freq.php . This driver should be a
messageBody:
Okay, I messed around a bit with Brian Roberts' frequency list, available at
http://www.wpi.edu/~flicken/language/shavian/freq.php . This driver should
be a lot more efficient, but it will take some time to learn. I tried to put
as many letters under single keys, based on their usage. Included in the zip
is also a short manual. I might even publish this on my website someday.
We'll see.

Just take a look and tell me what you think.

Ewout

Okay, I messed around a bit with Brian Roberts' frequency list, available at
http://www.wpi.edu/~flicken/language/shavian/freq.php . This driver should
be a lot more efficient, but it will take some time to learn. I tried to put
as many letters under single keys, based on their usage. Included in the zip
is also a short manual. I might even publish this on my website someday.
We'll see.

Just take a look and tell me what you think.

Ewout
